item.description:
Join me at River...a place for movement for an evening of laughter yoga on April Fool's Day! What better way to celebrate than by being silly, laughing, and playing!

No special clothing or mats needed. Just a water bottle (laughter is thirsty work!) and a willingness to surrender to laughter and play for an hour. We'll do laughter and breathing exercises, ending with a guided meditation.

Suggested donation of $5 to the Richmond Food Pantry.

Here's the Facebook event if you want to spread the word to Facebook friends:

https://www.facebook.com/events/233871020092803/?fref=ts
item.name: River Laughter Yoga
